00023 /** Implementing a singleton instance of Preference */
00024 Preferences* pref_get_instance()
00025 {
00026   static Preferences *instance = NULL;
00027   if(instance == NULL)
00028     instance = new Preferences();
00029   return instance;
00030 }

00032 /** Constructor */
00033 Preferences::Preferences()
00034 {
00035   read();
00036 }

00038 /** Read preferences from file */
00039 void Preferences::read()
00040 {
00041   std::string options_path = get_save_path();
00042 #ifdef WIN32
00043   std::string options_file = options_path + "\\preferences.ini";
00044 #else
00045 #ifdef SVN
00046   std::string options_file = options_path + "/preferences-svn";
00047 #else
00048   std::string options_file = options_path + "/preferences";
00049 #endif
00050 #endif
00051 
00052   set_default();
00053 
00054   try
00055   {
00056     CL_InputSource_File file(options_file);
00057     read_options_file(&file);
00058   }
00059   catch(CL_Error e)
00060   {
00061     // File doesn't exist
00062     try
00063     {
00064       CL_OutputSource_File file(options_file);
00065       set_default();
00066       write();
00067     }
00068     catch(CL_Error e)
00069     {
00070       // Directory may doesn't exist
00071       if(!CL_Directory::change_to(options_path))
00072       {
00073         if(CL_Directory::create(options_path))
00074         {
00075           // Now we can create the file
00076           try
00077           {
00078             CL_OutputSource_File file(options_file);
00079             set_default();
00080             write();
00081           }
00082           catch(CL_Error e)
00083           {
00084             std::cout << "Can't create " << options_file <<".\n";
00085             set_default();
00086           }
00087               
00088         }
00089         else
00090         {
00091           std::cout << "Can't access to " << options_path << ".\n";
00092           set_default();
00093         }
00094       }
00095       else
00096       {
00097         std::cout << "Can't access to " << options_file <<".\n";
00098         set_default();
00099       }
00100           
00101     }
00102 
00103   }
00104 }

00106 /** Write preferences into file */
00107 void Preferences::write()
00108 {
00109 
00110   std::string options_path = get_save_path();
00111 #ifdef WIN32
00112   std::string options_file = options_path + "\\preferences.ini";
00113 #else
00114 #ifdef SVN
00115   std::string options_file = options_path + "/preferences-svn";
00116 #else
00117   std::string options_file = options_path + "/preferences";
00118 #endif
00119 #endif
00120 
00121 
00122   try
00123   {
00124     CL_OutputSource_File file(options_file);
00125     write_options_file(&file);
00126   }
00127   catch(CL_Error e)
00128   {
00129     std::cout << "Can't write file " << options_file <<".\n";
00130   }
00131 }

00134 /** Read preferences from file */
00135 void Preferences::read_options_file(CL_InputSource_File *file)
00136 {
00137   try{
00138 
00139   file->open();
00140   
00141   IniFile ini;
00142   ini.read(file);
00143   
00144   render_opengl = ini.get("OpenGL", render_opengl);
00145   fullscreen = ini.get("Fullscreen", fullscreen);
00146   sound_level = ini.get("Sound Level", sound_level);
00147   music_level = ini.get("Music Level", music_level);
00148   maxfps = ini.get("MaxFPS", maxfps);
00149   colorblind = ini.get("Colorblind", colorblind);
00150   
00151   std::string skin_file = ini.get("Skin", skin);
00152     try{
00153       CL_Zip_Archive zip_test(skin_file);
00154       skin = skin_file;
00155     }
00156     catch(CL_Error e)
00157     {
00158       std::cout << "Skin " << skin_file << " was not found or is not a zip file, we use " << skin << " instead."  << std::endl;
00159     }
00160 
00161

00202 void Preferences::write_options_file(CL_OutputSource_File *file)
00203 {
00204   file -> open();
00205 
00206   IniFile ini;
00207   ini.clear();
00208   ini.add("OpenGL", render_opengl);
00209   ini.add("Fullscreen", fullscreen);
00210   ini.add("Sound Level", sound_level);
00211   ini.add("Music Level", music_level);
00212   ini.add("MaxFPS", maxfps);
00213   ini.add("Colorblind", colorblind);
00214   ini.add("Skin", skin);
00215   
00216   ini.write(file);
00217 
00218   
00219 
00220   /*
00221   // File revision
00222   file -> write_uint8(OPTIONS_FILE_REVISION);
00223   // Use OpenGL
00224   file -> write_bool8(render_opengl);
00225   // Fullscreen
00226   file -> write_bool8(fullscreen);
00227   // Sound level
00228   file -> write_int32(sound_level);
00229   // Music level
00230   file -> write_int32(music_level);
00231   // Skin
00232   file -> write_string(skin);
00233   // Maxfps
00234   file -> write_int16(maxfps);
00235   // ColorBlind mode
00236   file -> write_bool8(colorblind);
00237   */
00238 
00239   file -> close();
00240 }

00242 void Preferences::set_default()
00243 {
00244   revision = OPTIONS_FILE_REVISION;
00245   render_opengl = false;
00246   maxfps = 250;
00247   sound_level = 10;
00248   music_level = 10;
00249   fullscreen = false;
00250   colorblind = false;
00251   skin = CL_System::get_exe_path() + "skins/aqua.zip";
00252 }

00273 
00274 std::string get_save_path()
00275 {
00276 #ifdef WIN32
00277   return CL_System::get_exe_path() + "\\savedata";
00278 #else
00279   return ((std::string)getenv("HOME")) + "/.openalchemist";
00280 #endif
00281 }
